name: unitree-go2-robot
description: MCP Server for Unitree Go2 Robot Control
author: Claude Code

network_interface.description: Network interface to connect to robot (e.g. 'en8')

tools.name: capture_image
tools.description: Capture image from robot's front camera with optional saving

tools.name: get_robot_pose
tools.description: Get current robot position and orientation in 3D space

tools.name: get_robot_position_map
tools.description: Get robot position on SLAM map with coordinate system details

tools.name: robot_stand_up
tools.description: Command robot to stand up from lying position

tools.name: robot_stand_down
tools.description: Command robot to lie down from standing position

tools.name: robot_move
tools.description: Move robot with specified velocities for a duration

tools.name: enable_lidar
tools.description: Enable the robot's lidar sensor for point cloud data

tools.name: get_point_cloud_data
tools.description: Get current lidar point cloud data with filtering options

tools.name: detect_green_ball
tools.description: Detect and localize green ball (RGB 90,180,120) using camera + lidar

tools.name: get_ball_position
tools.description: Get current detected ball position in world coordinates

tools.name: get_robot_status
tools.description: Get comprehensive robot status including all sensors and capabilities
